param.name: timespan
param.doc: The time span of records to return, given in the form 'n%', where 'n' is the duration and '%' is the units. Valid units are 'm', 'h' or 'd' for minutes, hours or days respectively. The duration of the records returned is from the current system time minus the given time span to the current system time. (For example, one day '1d' returns statistics for the previous day, two hours '2h' returns statistics for the previous two hours)

method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve the Memory Usage Statistics using the web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the resource URI.
